faq.question: How accurate are the answers?
faq.answer: Very accurate! AI answers are grounded in the document content with direct quotes and page references. Powered by Google Gemini for maximum accuracy.

faq.question: Can I ask follow-up questions?
faq.answer: Absolutely! AI remembers conversation context, so you can ask follow-ups, request clarifications, or explore topics deeper.

faq.question: What types of questions can I ask?
faq.answer: Any question about the document: factual questions, explanations, summaries, comparisons, locations of information, and more.

faq.question: Does it work with technical or academic PDFs?
faq.answer: Yes! Our AI understands complex terminology, scientific concepts, and academic language across all fields.

faq.question: Can I chat with multiple PDFs at once?
faq.answer: Pro and Team plans support multi-document chat, letting you ask questions across your entire document library.

faq.question: Are conversations saved?
faq.answer: Yes! All chat history is saved with each document, so you can return anytime and continue the conversation.
